memberdef.name: ZE_GUARD
memberdef.initializer: do { \ ze_result_t _st = (expr); \ if (_st != ZE_RESULT_SUCCESS) { \ std::ostringstream _oss; \ _oss << (msg) << " (ze_result=" << (int)_st << ")"; \ set_err(_oss.str().c_str()); \ return -(int)_st; \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: ZE guard macro: store message and return negative code on failure.

memberdef.name: ie_ze_launch_gemv_rowwise_f32

briefdescription.para: Row-wise GEMV FP32: y = alpha * W * x + beta * y.

detaileddescription.para: Row-wise GEMV FP32: y = alpha * W * x + beta * y.

parameterdescription.para: Host pointer to row-major matrix (rows x ldW).
Host pointer to output vector (length rows).
Number of rows in W and elements in y (>=1).
Number of columns in W and elements in x (>=1).
Scale for existing y (0 to overwrite).
